long_description: A rugged, compact pump for mountain bike front forks and rear shocks, the Planet Bike ShockMate 2.0 Suspension Pump lets you top off and fine-tune the inflation pressure of your suspension. The Planet Bike ShockMate 2.0 Suspension Pump features a compact, rugged design that's ideal for backcountry adventures. Swivel hose and pump head for easy attachment. Alloy barrel supplies smooth pumping action. Easy-to-read, industrial-class gauge inflates to 400 psi. Bleeder valve fine tunes the pressure.
short_description: A rugged, compact pump for mountain bike front forks and rear shocks, the Planet Bike ShockMate 2.0 Suspension Pump lets you top off and fine-tune the inflation pressure of your suspension.
